lethal.translation[0].definitions[0].def: causing death, or able to cause death
lethal.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a lethal cocktail of drink and pills
These chemicals are lethal to fish.
lethal.translation[0].definitions[1].def: likely to be powerful or dangerous â€“ often used humorously
lethal.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: They were all drinking lethal amounts of tequila!
